mapper.select: SELECT sys_user.user_id, sys_user.user_name, sys_user.phone, sys_user.password, sys_user.status, sys_user_dept.dept_id, sys_dept.dept_name FROM sys_user AS sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept AS sys_user_dept ON sys_user.user_id = sys_user_dept.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS sys_dept ON sys_user_dept.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id WHERE sys_user.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT sys_role_menu.menu_id FROM sys_user_role AS sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sys_menu.perms FROM sys_user_role AS sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sys_menu ON sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, user_name, phone, password, salt, status, login_ip, login_time FROM sys_user WHERE phone = #{phone}
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id NOT IN (#{superAdmin}, #{admin}) AND status = #{status}
